Name: Pernelle
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with soda and serve with straws.
Review: This long clear drink has a grassy, alpine aroma and a fresh pine finish.
History: Created in 2007 by Colin Asare-Appiah, London, England. Colin named this drink after the wife of the 14th-century alchemist Nicolas Flamel, who supported her husband in his search for the Philosopher's Stone.
Nutrition: One serving of Pernelle contains 233 calories
